meanings.sent1: She airproofed the windows by closing them tightly.
meanings.sent2: The workers airproofed the house before the storm.
meanings.sent3: The chef airproofed the jar to keep the cookies fresh.
meanings.sent4: He airproofed his heart against any more hurt.
meanings.sent5: The astronaut airproofed his suit before going into space.

meanings.definition: To seal (a room or container) to prevent the passage of air.
meanings.sent1: They airproofed the attic to keep out the cold air.
meanings.sent2: The scientist airproofed the lab to conduct the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The kids airproofed the clubhouse to keep their secrets safe.
meanings.sent4: She airproofed the suitcase to protect the delicate items inside.
meanings.sent5: The farmer airproofed the silo to store the grain without spoilage.
